attributes.action: set some kind of annual funding for the great work that the RSPCA does in helping sick, homeless and worst of all abused animals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i find it appalling that there is no funding from the goverment to a great well known charity like the RSPCA. please take a moment to sign this petition, it CAN make a difference. thank you

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
